auto:welcome.output: Hi %name%, *Welcome to the group!* Type /help to see what I can do.
auto:welcome.description: A welcome message for new users.

auto:goodbye.output: Goodbye %name%, *Hope to see you again soon!*
auto:goodbye.description: A farewell message for users leaving the group.

auto:ai.description: A message to prompt the ai for a question or input.

auto:fail.output: Maaf %name%, saya tidak mengerti. Bisa tolong ulangi?
auto:fail.description: A fallback message when the bot does not understand the input.

/hello.output: Hello %name%, *how can I assist you today?*

/help.output: Here are some *commands* you can use: /hello, /info, /exit.
/help.description: Provides a list of available commands.

/info.output: I can help you with *various tasks*. Type /help to see what I can do.
/info.description: Gives information about the bot's capabilities.
